name: Casual Racing Simulator
description:
CASUAL RACING SIMULATOR

A casual game where you race in a funny world full of unexpected challenges! Extra modes for veteran gamers who want an extra challenge.

THE STORY BEHIND THE PROJECT

Casual racing simulator was a game made during a competition. The game as it is in it's current state was made in only 24 hours. As the idea showed potential, we decided to release a demo and continue working on it.

GAME'S FUTURE

We will add plenty new content for the game. More challenges, more maps and more mechanics. 

We will (hopefully) fix all the bugs ass soon as possible.

BEFORE YOU PLAY

System requirements unknown. :)

Known bugs:

  1. Pausing while on grass causes weird stuff to happen;
  2. Checkpoint system completely broken;
  3. If you do not have partition 'D' in your PC, the game might not run.

Please let us know if you encounter any other bugs!

If you like the game leave a comment, tell your friends about it and stay tuned for future updates!
